attributes.action: Make All Disabled Parking Spaces available to anyone after 6:00 pm at night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that for the most part those unfortunate enough to be disabled are not in work and are thus able to visit facilities during the working day, the acres of unused disabled parking should be availble to all outside these hours to prevent inconvenience to the general population and prevent the system being brought into disrepute
